snippet.title: Deck-building Roguelite Puzzle "NeonVillage" Official Trailer 2
snippet.description:
"Neon Village" is a deck-builder game that combines "Match-3 Puzzle" and "Roguelike" elements. The main objective of the game is to gather unique villagers to solve puzzles, repay the bank, and develop your village.

A free demo is now available on the Steam store!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2916670/Neon_Village/

We post updates on the development progress on X (Twitter).
☞https://twitter.com/Encraft_JP
